snippet.title: Lost Words: Beyond the Page – Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Leap through the pages of Izzy’s journal and solve puzzles through the fantasy land of Estoria in Lost Words: Beyond the Page, releasing April 6, 2021 on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC.  

When Izzy comes to terms with the trauma of losing a loved one close to her, she envelopes herself into a surreal story that evolves and shapes itself in ways no one could ever see coming. 

The title has earned a wealth of awards during its lifetime, including ‘Best Indie Game’ at Game Connection Paris, ‘Excellence in Narrative’ at DevGAMM, ‘Best Audio Design’ from TIGA, ‘Special Selection Indie Award’ at Reboot Develop and ‘Best Story’ at Game Connection USA 

Play the demo now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/599610/Lost_Words_Beyond_the_Page/  

Follow Us on Twitter: http://modus.games/twitter  
Like Us on Facebook: http://modus.games/facebook  
Join our Discord: http://modus.games/discord
